options.name: Male
options.description: You are male.

options.name: Female
options.description: You are female.

categories.name: Race
categories.description: Your ancestral lineage shapes your innate abilities.

options.name: Human
options.description: Adaptable and ambitious, humans excel through determination rather than innate gifts.

options.name: Elf
options.description: Long-lived and graceful, elves possess an innate connection to magic and nature.

options.name: Dwarf
options.description: Stout and stubborn, dwarves are renowned for their resilience and craftsmanship.

options.name: Halfling
options.description: Small but surprisingly brave, halflings are known for their luck and quick feet.

options.name: Half-Orc
options.description: Bearing orcish blood, you possess great strength but face prejudice in civilized lands.

categories.name: Appearance
categories.description: Your physical characteristics - build, skin tone, hair, and portrait.

categories.name: Culture
categories.description: Where you were raised shapes your worldview and skills.

options.name: City Kid
options.description: Raised in the bustling streets of a great city, you learned to navigate crowds and politics.

options.name: Village Folk
options.description: A simple upbringing in a rural village taught you the value of community and hard work.

options.name: Noble House
options.description: Born to privilege, you were educated in the arts of leadership and etiquette.

options.name: Frontier Lands
options.description: Raised on the edge of civilization, you learned self-reliance and survival.

options.name: Wandering Tribes
options.description: Your people have no fixed home, moving with the seasons and the herds.

options.name: Royal Blood
options.description: Known or invisible, the blood of princes and kings runs in your veins. Doors open, arms are raised, and heads bow.

categories.name: Avocation
categories.description: Your former profession or training before you became an adventurer.

options.name: Soldier
options.description: You served in an army, learning discipline and the art of war.

options.name: Scholar
options.description: Your days were spent in study, poring over ancient texts and heretical histories.

options.name: Criminal
options.description: You lived outside the law, developing skills best used in the shadows.

options.name: Merchant
options.description: You learned the art of the deal, reading people and situations for profit.

options.name: Acolyte
options.description: You served a temple, learning the rites and dogma of your faith.

options.name: Hunter
options.description: You tracked and killed for your living, learning patience and precision.

categories.name: Virtue & Vice
categories.description: Your defining personality traits - both light and shadow.

options.name: Brave
options.description: Fear does not rule you. You face danger head-on.

options.name: Honest
options.description: You speak truth even when lies would be easier.

options.name: Compassionate
options.description: The suffering of others moves you to action.

options.name: Clever
options.description: You see angles others miss, always thinking three steps ahead.

options.name: Wrathful
options.description: Anger burns hot in you, and you struggle to control it.

options.name: Greedy
options.description: Gold calls to you. You always want more.

options.name: Cowardly
options.description: Self-preservation is your highest priority.

options.name: Arrogant
options.description: You know your worth - and make sure others know it too.

options.name: Vice-Ridden
options.description: Drink, drugs, or gambling - something has its hooks in you.

options.name: Idealist
options.description: You believe in higher principles and strive to uphold them.

options.name: Pragmatist
options.description: Results matter more than methods. You do what works.

options.name: Nihilist
options.description: Nothing truly matters. This freedom can be liberating... or terrifying.

options.name: Hedonist
options.description: Life is short. Pleasure is the only worthwhile pursuit.

options.name: Fatalist
options.description: What will be, will be. You accept your destiny.

categories.name: Edge
categories.description: Your defining capability - what sets you apart.

options.name: Born Fighter
options.description: Combat comes naturally to you. You see openings others miss.

options.name: Touched by Magic
options.description: The arcane flows through you. You can learn to cast spells.

options.name: Silver Tongue
options.description: Words are your weapon. You can talk your way into - or out of - anything.

options.name: Shadow Walker
options.description: You move unseen, strike unseen, leave unseen.

options.name: Unkillable
options.description: You've survived things that should have killed you. Fate isn't done with you.

options.name: Natural Leader
options.description: Others look to you for guidance. Your presence inspires.

options.name: Healer's Knowledge
options.description: You know how to treat wounds and illness.

options.name: Lockbreaker
options.description: Locks are puzzles, and you solve puzzles.

options.name: Lorekeeper
options.description: You have studied history, legends, and forgotten knowledge.

options.name: Wilderness Expert
options.description: The wild holds no terror for you.

options.name: Fearsome Presence
options.description: You know how to make others fear you.

options.name: Athletic
options.description: Climbing, swimming, running - your body is a finely tuned instrument.

categories.name: Feats
categories.description: Exceptional abilities that go beyond normal training.

options.name: Master Duelist
options.description: In single combat, few can match your blade.

options.name: Berserker Rage
options.description: You can enter a fury that makes you nearly unstoppable.

options.name: Iron Will
options.description: Your mind is a fortress. Mental attacks slide off you.

options.name: Eagle Eye
options.description: Your ranged attacks find their mark with uncanny precision.

options.name: Polyglot
options.description: Languages come easily to you. You speak many tongues.

options.name: Flame Conjuration
options.description: You can summon and control fire.

options.name: Healing Light
options.description: You can mend wounds with magical energy.

options.name: Veil of Shadows
options.description: You can create illusions and bend perception.

options.name: Third Eye
options.description: You can sense hidden things and glimpse the future.

options.name: Mind Touch
options.description: You can influence thoughts and emotions.

options.name: Fine Blade
options.description: A well-crafted sword - not ornate, but deadly.

options.name: Hunter's Bow
options.description: A reliable bow with a quiver of arrows.

options.name: Sturdy Armor
options.description: Leather or chain that has seen some use.

options.name: Spellbook
options.description: A grimoire containing your magical notes.

options.name: Thieves' Tools
options.description: Lockpicks, wire, and other implements of the trade.

options.name: Riding Horse
options.description: A loyal mount for swift travel.

options.name: Cursed Artifact
options.description: A strange object of power that whispers to you. Its purposes are unclear.

optionImageConfig.basePrompt:
You are generating option art for a dark fantasy RPG character creator.
These are selection cards shown during character creation - the image should be iconic and symbolic of the option, but they should not include any non-diagetic text. No "Elf" label on an Elf picture.
Square 1:1 format, suitable for a card/button. Fill the image completely: no frame or whitespace.
optionImageConfig.styleModifiers: Dark fantasy art style, painterly, dramatic lighting, striking color palette
